title: 原版村民交易，附魔物品为什么不能换同样附魔的物品？
author: z2308795
txt_content:
游戏版本1.11.2，东西放进去可以识别，但却怎么也交易不了，也就是交易的东西拖不出来，问题出在哪呢？
这里放出截图和交易部分命令方块代码，求高手解惑：




QQ截图20180327035707.jpg (47.58 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2018-3-27 04:03 上传





{buy:{id:"minecraft:shield",Damage:0s,Count:1,tag:{Unbreakable:1b,AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:12,UUIDMost:12,Amount:5.0,AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:K_Resistance,Slot:offhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:13,UUIDMost:13,Amount:10.0,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health,Slot:offhand}],display:{Name:"嘲弄之盾",Lore:["固若金汤！"]},ench:[{id:0,lvl:10},{id:1,lvl:10},{id:3,lvl:10},{id:4,lvl:10},{id:7,lvl:10}]}},maxUses:9999999,sell:{id:"minecraft:shield",Damage:0s,Count:1,tag:{Unbreakable:1b,AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:12,UUIDMost:12,Amount:5.0,AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:K_Resistance,Slot:offhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:13,UUIDMost:13,Amount:10.0,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health,Slot:offhand}],display:{Name:"嘲弄之盾",Lore:["固若金汤！"]},ench:[{id:0,lvl:10},{id:1,lvl:10},{id:3,lvl:10},{id:4,lvl:10},{id:7,lvl:10}]}}},]}}

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ⊙v⊙ 于 2018-3-26 13:57 编辑 

怎么又是这个问题...嘛...能识别说明对应,但是不能拿,因为其实并没有对上...mojang的锅
所以,字节类型的补上""
数值的补上后缀

...比如
Count:1b
UUIDLeast:12L
UUIDMost:12L
Amount:5.0d
AttributeName:"generic.armor"
Name:"generic.attackDamage"
Slot:"offhand"

大概就是这些吧...自己把这些都找出来修一下





这样写吧...试过,别说1.11,在1.12也是稳了
/summon Villager ~1 ~ ~ {Profession:0,Career:1,CareerLevel:42,Offers:{Recipes:[{
buy:{id:"minecraft:shield",Damage:0s,Count:1b,

tag:{
Unbreakable:1b,
AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:12L,UUIDMost:12L,Amount:5.0d,AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"K_Resistance",Slot:"offhand"},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:13L,UUIDMost:13L,Amount:10.0d,AttributeName:"generic.maxHealth",Name:"Health",Slot:"offhand"}],
display:{Name:"嘲弄之盾",Lore:["固若金汤！"]},ench:[{id:0s,lvl:10s},{id:1s,lvl:10s},{id:3s,lvl:10s},{id:4s,lvl:10s},{id:7s,lvl:10s}]
}

},maxUses:9999999,

sell:{id:"minecraft:shield",Damage:0s,Count:1b,

tag:{
Unbreakable:1b,
AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:12L,UUIDMost:12L,Amount:5.0d,AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"K_Resistance",Slot:"offhand"},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:13L,UUIDMost:13L,Amount:10.0d,AttributeName:"generic.maxHealth",Name:"Health",Slot:"offhand"}],
display:{Name:"嘲弄之盾",Lore:["固若金汤！"]},ench:[{id:0s,lvl:10s},{id:1s,lvl:10s},{id:3s,lvl:10s},{id:4s,lvl:10s},{id:7s,lvl:10s}]
}

}}]}}复制代码

replies.author: z2308795
replies.txt_content:
⊙v⊙ 发表于 2018-3-27 04:03
怎么又是这个问题...嘛...能识别说明对应,但是不能拿,因为其实并没有对上...mojang的锅
所以,字节类型的补 ...
万分感谢~

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
z2308795 发表于 2018-3-27 14:51
万分感谢~
你可以把物品扔在地上，然后entitydata @e[type=item,r=5] {} 看下该物品的nbt是否带了数据类型以及引号之类的，不同版本有可能会有所不同
